Text:
Goddammit, I knew shit like this was gonna happen with those stubborn naming conventions.

WATCH "THE SNOWMEN" BETWEEN 7E05 AND 7E06!!! DO NOT WAIT UNTIL AFTER 7E13, AND DO NOT WATCH IT BEFORE 7E01!!!
